description: Try our easy to follow Oven-baked chicken risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Risotto,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Oven-baked chicken risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Australian RSPCA-approved chicken thigh fillets, quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Heat half the oil in a large flameproof frying pan over medium-high heat. Add rice and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until coated.
Add stock and bring to the boil. Cover. Bake for 18 minutes, stirring halfway, or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook chicken for 4 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through. Add peas to pan and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until heated through.
Stir chicken and peas into risotto. Season with pepper and serve.
